trim-solo.title: Paraglider Trimming
trim-solo.description: Precision trimming services to optimize your wing's performance using professional tension meters and line geometry analysis.

trim-tandem.title: Tandem Paraglider Trimming
trim-tandem.description: Precision trimming services to optimize your tandem wing's performance using professional tension meters and line geometry analysis.

service-solo.title: Paraglider Full Service
service-solo.description: Complete servicing including canopy fabric inspection and strength testing, line strength analysis, riser state evaluation, and paraglider trimming.

service-tandem.title: Tandem Paraglider Full Service
service-tandem.description: Complete servicing including canopy fabric inspection and strength testing, line strength analysis, riser state evaluation, and paraglider trimming.

service-harness.title: Harness Service & Inspection
service-harness.description: Complete inspection and service of the harness to ensure airworthiness.

repack-solo.title: Parachute Repacking
repack-solo.description: Professional emergency parachute repacking following manufacturer specifications and safety protocols.

repack-steerable.title: Steerable Parachute Repacking
repack-steerable.description: Professional steerable parachute repacking following manufacturer specifications and safety protocols.

repair.title: Glider Repair
repair.description: Comprehensive repair services for paraglider canopies and components. Currently developing advanced sewing capabilities.
